description: red with black section on back; eye above three circles on back; gold and gray ribbon near bottom, at waist, and near edges of sleeves; six brass buttons down front, center; gold ribbon sewn in pointed shapes above gold and gray ribbon at bottom and edges of sleeves
markings: \'The Henderson Ames Co., Kalamazoo, Mich. Military and Society Goods\', \'David as Prince\', sewn inside collar
title: Odd Fellows Cloak, 'David as Prince'
